duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic laboratory operations and analysis independently, with detailed review by experienced personnel.
Maintain study documentation and laboratory records, ensuring compliance with appropriate guidelines.
Assist in equipment setup, maintenance, and routine operation, supporting general equipment maintenance.
Participate in project meetings and provide input for the implementation of startup priorities, systems, and SOPs.
Serve as an analyst on projects and recognize deviations from expected results, taking appropriate action.
Support the validation of methodologies and analyze samples for various compounds and components.
Contribute to the biotechnology group's priorities and systems, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree in science or related field; experience may be substituted for education.
